short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows an orange cloud in the omnibar when you are browsing a site that uses Cloudflare

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Claire adds an unobtrusive icon to your browser that turns orange when you are browsing a website that uses Cloudflare. You can also see if the website is using modern technologies like HTTP/2, IPv6 and Cloudflare's own Railgun.
